body.section: What are payments?Payment is the transfer of one form of goods, services, or financial assets in exchange for another form of goods, services, or financial assets in acceptable proportions that have been previously agreed upon by all parties involved.

section.title: Faster payments, better cash flow
section.p: You can get paid in as fast as 2 business days, improve your brand, and look more professional when you enable Payments by Wave. This will let you accept credit cards and bank payments for as little as 1% per transaction.

section.title: Give your customers what they want
section.p: Customers want an easy way to pay online without any hassle. You can email your customers an invoice and they can use the simple and secure “Pay Now” button to send over your payment. Fees are always low rate and there are no hidden fees.

section.title: Never lose track of payments
section.p: With Wave, your invoices and payments automatically flow into your accounting records. You will never lose track of payments again because of the cloud and you’ll be all set when tax season starts.

section.title: Send your invoices
section.p: Email invoices with a secure “Pay Now” button after you’ve turned on the online payments option. These are important to have for your business.

section.title: Get paid online
section.p: Customers can pay instantly by using credit card or secure bank payment when they view the invoice online. This is an easy way for customers because it removes any hassle. Automate bookkeeping: payments connect seamlessly with your Wave account.

section.title: Money is deposited
section.p: You will get money in your account in 2 business days for credit card payments and 2-7 business days for bank payments . All major cards accepted: Visa, Visa Debit, Mastercard, Mastercard Debit, American Express and Discover.
